import java.io.*;
class hj
{
  public static void main(String args[])
  throws IOException
  {
      BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
      int n,k,i,j;
          n=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
          k=n-1;
          for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
          {
              for(j=1;j<=k;j++)
               System.out.print(" ");
              for(j=i;j>=1;j--)
               System.out.print(j);
              for(j=2;j<=i;j++)
               System.out.print(j);
              System.out.println();
              k--;
          }
          k=1;
          for(i=(n-1);i>=1;i--)
          {
              for(j=1;j<=k;j++)
               System.out.print(" ");
              for(j=i;j>=1;j--)
               System.out.print(j);
              for(j=2;j<=i;j++)
               System.out.print(j);
              System.out.println();
              k++;
          }
  }
}
